channel.title: Zapatillas on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Zapatillas on Simba Tango

item.title: Zapatillas de tango
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description:
Guess what was in the mailbox for our little son the other day? A nice pair of ‘shoes’ made by a friend back home. She has Â specialized in this kind of baby footwear perfect for developing small feet and new walking skills.

All hand made, she makes an effort in always finding a new twist, theming them with butterflies, elephants or monsters. Or creating the very first tango shoes for a tangobaby. At least she knows the parents are fanaticos de tango. She has her own blog, but it has recently become invitation only, so I won’t provide a link.

Needless to say, much appreciated.

Simba’s shoe added for scale.
